about_the_game:
From the halls of lost memories to a creepy confrontation, from innocent days to dark moments shrouded in mystery, the music box is the perfect accompaniment. Whether you want wonderment, sadness, need to creep out the player, or make them feel safe before things go wrong, composer Joel Steudler's nine music box tracks have you covered. Also includes seven very useful short melodic musical events!

Features:

- 9 BGM music box tracks for your RPG!
- 7 ME music box music events: short melodies to punctuate a scene!
- .ogg and .m4a formats included.
- Royalty free music to use in RPG Maker or the engine of your choice

Tracklist:

1 - Dream Dance
2 - Enchanted Entrance
3 - innocent Interlude
4 - Lilting Lullaby
5 - Melancholy Memory
6 - Nursery Nightmare
7 - Nursery Nighttime
8 - Spooky Spells
9 - Wandering Wizard

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

name: RPG Maker MV - Magical Music Box Music Pack

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: RPG Maker MV - Magical Music Box Music Pack - $4.99 $3.24

package_groups.title: Buy RPG Maker MV - Magical Music Box Music Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

short_description: The distinctive tones of a music box can evoke creepy crawls, magical mystery, or childlike innocence. This collection of nine tunes and seven musical events can provide the perfect scene setter, putting the player in just the right mood.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese
